Illumination.name: Illumination
Illumination.blurb: Lux's damaging spells charge the target with energy for 6 seconds. Lux's next attack ignites the energy, dealing bonus magic damage (depending on Lux's level) to the target.
Illumination.description: Innate: Damaging enemies with abilities marks them with light energy for 6 seconds.
Illumination.description2: Her basic attacks and  Final Spark consume the mark, dealing 20 − 190 (based on level) (+ 20% AP)  bonus magic damage.

Light Binding.name: Light Binding
Light Binding.blurb: Lux releases a sphere of light that binds and deals damage to up to two enemy units.
Light Binding.description: Active: Lux releases a sphere of light in a line that deals magic damage to the first two enemies hit and  roots them for 2 seconds.
Light Binding.notes: * Targets affected by a  spell shield or by  Black Shield count towards Light Binding's two-target limit.

Prismatic Barrier.name: Prismatic Barrier
Prismatic Barrier.blurb: Lux throws her wand and bends the light around any friendly target it touches, protecting them from enemy damage.
Prismatic Barrier.description: Active: Lux launches her wand in the target direction which returns to her after reaching maximum range.
Prismatic Barrier.description2: The outgoing wand  shields Lux and all allied champions it touches for 2.5 seconds.
Prismatic Barrier.description3: The returning wand shields for the same amount and for the same duration, while also stacking with the outgoing shield and resetting its duration.
Prismatic Barrier.description4: The shields can only stack up to 2 times. Additional shields will neither reset the duration nor strengthen it.
Prismatic Barrier.notes:
* If Lux dies before her wand changes direction it will fizzle upon reaching maximum range.
 Lux's wand decelerates on the way out and accelerates on the way back.

Lucent Singularity.name: Lucent Singularity
Lucent Singularity.blurb: Fires an anomaly of twisted light to an area, which slows nearby enemies. Lux can detonate it to damage enemies in the area of effect.
Lucent Singularity.description: Active: Lux sends an anomaly of twisted light to the target area for up to 5 seconds,  slowing enemies inside and  revealing the area around it.
Lucent Singularity.description2: At the end of the duration or if Lucent Singularity is reactivated, the area detonates, dealing magic damage.
Lucent Singularity.description3: The slow lingers for 0.25 seconds after leaving the area.
Lucent Singularity.notes:
* Lux can re-cast Lucent Singularity in flight to detonate on arrival.
 Lucent Singularity grants  sight while also in flight.

Final Spark.name: Final Spark
Final Spark.blurb: After gathering energy, Lux fires a beam of light that deals damage to all targets in the area. If Final Spark kills a champion, part of its cooldown is refunded. In addition, triggers Lux's passive ability and refreshes the Illumination debuff duration.
Final Spark.description: Active: Lux fires a giant laser in a line that deals magic damage, briefly  revealing enemies as well as the surrounding area.
Final Spark.notes:
* Lux cannot use any ability, summoner spell, or item while casting, but she can reactivate  Lucent Singularity.
 If Lux is  displaced while casting, Final Spark will fire from her original location.
 Final Spark only goes on cooldown when it fires and not when Lux starts casting. If she dies while casting, Final Spark will not go on cooldown.
